content: I think I'll start by asking my dad if he knows more about my grandmother's recipe or if he can try to recreate it. I'll also ask him about the specific spices and seasonings she used, and see if he remembers any stories or tips she shared with him. Who knows, maybe he'll even have some old recipe books or notes that can help us get started. Do you have any tips on how to approach this conversation with my dad, or any questions I should ask him to get the most information out of our conversation?
